Subtask 1/12.activity: Check and respond to urgent emails

Subtask 2/12.activity: Review daily schedule and prioritize tasks

Subtask 3/12.activity: Update patient records and medical software

Subtask 5/12.activity: Prepare for customer interactions (e.g., greeting customers, answering phones)

Subtask 6/12.activity: Review and prepare for any special orders or requests

Subtask 7/12.activity: Take a short break to stretch and recharge

Subtask 8/12.activity: Check in with colleagues and discuss daily tasks

Subtask 9/12.activity: Prepare for any meetings or consultations

Subtask 10/12.activity: Review and update the pharmacy's social media accounts

Subtask 11/12.activity: Prepare for opening the pharmacy to customers

Subtask 12/12.activity: Finalize preparations and get ready to start the day
